entry.title: Uzuhan - Throwing Me a Sign (Feat. Jordan Marcotte) - 가사

link.title: Uzuhan - Throwing Me a Sign (Feat. Jordan Marcotte) - 가사

entry.content:
[Verse 1]
So it hit me like an anvil
It’s been a couple years now
Every talk is a gamble
Ante up with my fears now
Man, I’m feeling kind of bashful
Ain’t no other way to put it
Ain’t no other way to cut it up
Handful of pride. Yea I gotta cut it up
Feeling kind of scrambled, put it in an omelette
Girl you know I’m cheffing up a real good line
To show you I’m a real one, a real good guy
Can’t you see we got a real good vibe?
Can’t cook but I’ll try to bake a real good pie for you
But a part of me is holding back though
Instead of moving forward
I’m running through the back door (oh no)
Fear is telling me to run away
I ain’t listening today. I swear...

[Hook]
She was throwing me a sign
It was headed my way
I got the memo, I feel like jello
Hope it doesn’t show up on my face
I don’t really mind
If it isn’t my day
I got the memo, I feel like jello
Hope it doesn’t show up on my face
I don't wanna fall in love
Fear of failure’s way too much
I don't wanna fall in love
But when I look at you I reconsider!
Tell my boys that I'm
Going for it x3
Going ‘til I'm gone
Tell my boys that I'm
Going for it x3
Going ‘til I'm gone

[Verse 2]
Really don't know how to word this (oh my)
When you look at me I feel nervous (oh my)
If I'm being honest for a minute
You got my heart spinning. I'll admit it.
I cannot believe I'm not dreaming!
You're the type of woman I envisioned. God bless!!
Caught up in this moment, I ain't moving on
My heart is burning up. Pull the fire alarm
It's like a raging furnace took a firearm
And (BUCK BUCK) straight up to my chest with that tiger balm
I like the way your mind works
When you talk about your passions, girl, you’re painting it with fireworks
I can’t wait to see the rest of this canvas
I know it’s crazy but I think I have a chance

entry.title: Uzuhan - Shallow (Feat. Ruth Cho) - 가사
entry.content:
[Intro]
I don’t wanna be...

[Verse 1]
I’m thinking bout myself only
Set a holy grail on me
Decorate it with the finest
Type of silverware only
Better put a veil on me
Looking at you like a trophy
Maybe cuz I feel lonely
Write a fairytale of me
Sandcastle in the air
Hope it doesn't fail on me
Hope it doesn't fail on me
맞아 맞아 man, it’s way too easy to be caught up in the lies
맞아 맞아 everything in HD got me thinking so slime
맞아 맞아 all these superficial thoughts keep plaguing my mind
Man I wanna only think it's their problem, not mine

[Chorus]
I don’t wanna be so shallow
I don’t wanna be so shallow
I wanna see you beyond the glamour
I wanna see you beyond the glamour

[Verse 2]
The truth is…
I’m like a taxidermy
So concerned about the vanity I'm acting phony
Living for approval dying by the acrimony
Envy on the low pretending that I'm lacking worries
Heart and my soul’s in need of revival
Feel it in my throat, my pulse, all the vitals (아이구)
I guess my need to be known’s the same as your own
I'm just tryna find my shalom (pull-up) SKRT
I gotta kill that!
Treating people like commodities
No, I don’t feel that!
Uncle Phil that habit out of me
This will make a man out of me
Took another little swig of my ego
Lord, I need a veto
Am I Really playing at casinos
with my life in the dice?
What's the price I gotta pay
to put aside my pride and require me to say?

[Bridge]
Help me love you better. Help me to love you right x3
I cannot do this on my own.

entry.content:

They knew right away, sink or swim, there’s no life line

Nobody’s filling these shoes
Ballin’ on a budget at the Golden Arches

Sweat on my brow. Don’t make a sound

I’m stepping the ground. I’m counting my blessings
aggressively pushing the boundaries all for my family
Came to this land. A dream in my hand
All of that changed when life decided to switch up my plans
Tell me now. How did we get so low?
Tell me now. How did we get so bruised?
Tell me now. How could they be so rude?

Hmmm Ching Chang Chong?
I'll keep it trilly
Some of you sounding real silly
All of your “HOOWAH, HIYA” got me like really?
I’m guessing that it’s my mistake
for thinking that people can do better (do better)
knew better? (you better chill)
I refuse to be your Jet Li
I refuse to be your Jackie Chan
Keep on yapping off like that
Keep on yapping all that jazz
A man can only take so much
When you keep on stomping, jumping on his back (crack)
I’m not a ninja (shing) Hey, I don’t do kung fu (kungfu)
But if you’re pushing me over the edge
might see these knuckles do some
Crouching tiger hidden dragon
Get you feeling like Aladdin
Introduce you to a whole new world
go ahead and see what happens
But... I’m not the violent type
Real loud cuz I’m not the silent type
I don’t fit the 9 to 5. Don’t try to put me in a category
I’m that 고기 조림 eating full time rapper
that your papa hates and gets mama worried
Not your ordinary: doctor, lawyer, and accountant
You know I’m an allegory
Maybe more like a unicorn!
Life of faith, I trust You, Lord
Monochrome I do adore
Distressed denim my uniform
